                          java.lang.Integer eventCount,
                          int keyCount)
        Ctor.
        Parameters:
        name - index name, if provided
        bytes - memory measurement, if available
        streamNum - stream number in the statement that is providing indexable events
        eventCount - number of events, if the count is available
        keyCount - number of keys maintained, if available
